sendResponse

public static void sendResponse(Request req,
                                RequestContext ctx)
                         throws IOException,
                                javax.servlet.ServletException
Replay a request.

This method will take information about a request and replay it - either by issuing a redirect if the request was a GET request, or by creating a POST form with the original form data.

In the POST case, the context configuration is checked for the Constants.PROP_REPOST_SERVLET property. If it has been set, this servlet will be invoked. Otherwise a default page is displayed.

In both cases, two attributes are added to the request context: "request" which holds the Request object and "home" which contains a link to the default hom page.

Throws:
IOException
javax.servlet.ServletException

getEngine
